column4: help needed : i want to switch from xp to ubuntu, but im a little worried about the x-fi drivers? is there a driver out that works with ubuntu (works as in listen to music/movies, dont really need the rest)?
mp3 has no issues you can listen using w32codecs. easy to install once you have ubuntu installed come back here and someone can point you in the right direction
no you need to install the driveers
